document_data.mainbody:
Isbeth was a giant black wolf kept by the Zhentarim that operated within an underground trading post hidden deep within the caverns underneath Waukeens Rest, during the late 15 century DR.
Isbeth spent much of her time protecting his human Jarg. He often expressed frustration at Jargs regular pacing and retracing of his steps.
Isbeth reluctantly followed Jarg around as he helped clear out the Zhentarim hideout in the , for risk of having their operation upended by the Flaming Fist of Baldurs Gate.
